title: The Lucas Brothers
itunes:title: The Lucas Brothers
description:
Hot off their Oscar nomination for best original screenplay for Judas and the Black Messiah, Kenny and Keith Lucas (On Drugs, 22 Jump Street, Crashing) now campaign for a Razzie by doing the Good For You podcast. Whitney and the Lucas Brothers talk about the making of Judas and the Black Messiah, Ayahuasca, wolves, and death. 

 

👕 THE GOOD FOR YOU MERCH » store.whitneycummings.com

 

🙂 SPONSOR 🙃
BILLIE » http://www.mybillie.com/whitney EARNEST » http://www.earnest.com/whitney ATHLETIC GREENS » http://www.athleticgreens.com/whitney OUTSTANDING FOODS » http://www.outstandingfoods.com/whitney      🐘 DON’T RIDE ELEPHANTS! ❤️

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
